attributes.action: Debate on sanctions on tax havens.
attributes.additional_details:
The system with which we have in the UK in general allows the lower income members of society to pay some tax, the middle income members to pay more tax. Yet the richest in society seem to avoid paying almost no tax at all as they are able to move there money to offshore accounts or live abroad to pay a much lower rate of tax as they can move as they are rich.

It is about time that sanctions were imposed on these countries who reduce there tax to such a level and are taxing tax from the British people.
